entries.title: World of Horror will finally release in Summer 2023
entries.description: The slow-but-steady development of the acclaimed survival horror indie will come to a close.

entries.title: What was the best year for PC gaming?
entries.description: There are great PC games every year, but which single year brought us the greatest collection of great games?

entries.title: CES 2023 preview: All the PC gaming hardware you can expect from the show
entries.description: CPUs, GPUs, 18-inch laptops and OLED screens galore.

entries.title: What we want to see in a Steam Deck 2: more power, less noise, and bright colors
entries.description: We might be asking too much.

entries.title: The arrival of Overwatch 2 meant the slow destruction of my favourite mode
entries.description: Too many tanks, too many many tanks.

entries.title: Good job, internet: You bullied NFTs out of mainstream games
entries.description: Or at the very least, made fun of them enough to keep us all from losing our grip on reality.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 562 answer and hint for Monday, January 2
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #562 puzzle.

entries.title: Great moments in PC gaming: Killing a guy with another guy
entries.description: The enemy of my enemy is my friend. The friend of my enemy is my favourite weapon.

entries.title: Nvidia's new RTX 3050s come with an even lower TDP
entries.description: If they can get it down to 75W next, please.

entries.title: Criminally oversized Skyrim mod expands the Thieves Guild, lets you romance a thief
entries.description: A man in a bath, on PC Gamer? Whoever heard of such a thing.

entries.title: Software engineer busted after being inspired by Office Space scam
entries.description: Work sucks. But maybe don't try to repeat workplace crimes you see in movies.

entries.title: Payday 3 has a Steam page
entries.description: 'This is the year of Payday 3' according to Overkill Software.
